Class BaseLoginModule

java.lang.Object
ca.openosp.openo.login.jaas.BaseLoginModule
All Implemented Interfaces:
LoginModule
Direct Known Subclasses:
LdapLoginModule
public class BaseLoginModule extends Object implements LoginModule
Common base for a login module.

    • isAuthorizationEnabled

      public boolean isAuthorizationEnabled()
      Checks if this login module should provide authorization information after successful authentication is complete.
      Returns:
      Returns true if role and group information should be populated and false otherwise.
